The game takes full advantage of stunning Unity 3D graphics to provide a visually rich experience.   \r\n\r\n[Contact Us]\r\nFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/AstroLordsWin10/\r\n\r\nYou will take on the role of an Astro Lord, leader of your own asteroids in the Oort Cloud on the fringes of the solar system. As well as vying against other players for dominance in PVP combat, you must also face off against a mysterious alien race which has invaded the Cloud.   \r\n\r\n[Game Features]\r\n---Build your  asteroids---\r\n Asteroids are at the heart of your Empire. You begin the game with a home asteroid which you must develop through the construction of facilities such as mines, power plants, factories and laboratories. Resources must be gathered, or stolen, to construct ammunition and cyborgs to fuel your expansion. Its simple to play but still has a strategic component to it\r\n\r\nThe objective of Uno Card Game is to empty all your cards before the other players get rid of theirs. The player reduces cards by discarding cards that match the top card in the Discard pile.\r\n\r\nUse the special action cards to frustrate your fellow players by stealing turns away from them. Match the colour or the number of the last card on the discard stack to play your cards.\r\n\r\nUno with Friends - Card Game is a very simple color and number matching game. The deck consists of 108 cards, of which there are 25 of each color (red, green, blue, and yellow), each color having two of each rank except zero. The ranks in each color are zero to nine, \"Skip\", \"Draw Two\", and \"Reverse\" (the last three being \"action cards\"). In addition, the deck contains four each of \"Wild\" and \"Wild Draw Four\" cards\r\n\r\nEach player is dealt 7 cards and the remaining cards are placed face down to form a draw pile. The first player has to match the card in the discard pile either by number or color or the player can throw down a Wild Card else he must pick a card from the draw pile. If he can play what is drawn, great. Otherwise play moves to the next person.\r\n\r\nIn Uno The card deck contains four colors with numbers from 0 to 9, as well as Action cards - \"Reverse\", \"Skip\", \"Take Two\", \"Wild\" and \"Wild Take Four\".\r\n\r\nIf you forget to say Uno, you are penalized by having to draw two more cards from the pile.\r\n\r\nUno Card Game trains concentration, memory, and reaction time.\r\n\r\nThe first one to get rid of their cards wins!\r\n\r\nDo you like playing Uno? Mais faites attention à ne pas vous retrouver pris entre deux feux !\r\n Un système de quêtes façon MMORPG vous permet de vous concentrer sur l'histoire principale ou d'accepter une multitude de quêtes annexes.\r\n Suivez une histoire épique et percez le mystère derrière l'origine de l'apocalypse zombie.\r\n\r\nUN CHAOS MULTIJOUEUR MASSIF\r\n Faites équipe avec d'autres joueurs, ou réduisez-les en miettes dans de féroces batailles PvP.\r\n Remplissez des missions co-op spéciales : échappez-vous de zones infestées, escortez des convois d'approvisionnement, et repoussez des attaques-surprises.\r\n Plongez dans des batailles PvP à plusieurs équipes et détruisez tout ce qui bouge !\r\n\r\nDE L'ACTION INCESSANTE ET DES GRAPHISMES ÉPOUSTOUFLANTS\r\n Changez de point de vue pour voir le monde avec votre style de caméra préféré.\r\n Effectuez des mouvements super rapides grâce à un système de commandes intuitif et dynamique.\r\n Un style artistique avant-gardiste emplit le monde de paysages mémorables.
